text:
Hey Ali bhai 
chaapu banda wing ka, exam ke just pehle padh kr hi chaap deta tha. Esc201, MSO201 dono course me help krne ke liye thanks, waise to aur bhi bahut si baaton ke liye thanks bol skta jaise subah uthana, phone jada use krne pr daatna :P, kuch productive krne ke liye motivate krna. Bro you stick to your morning routine, chahe bahar kitni bhi thand ho that is very motivating (uss time samajh ni aata tha abhi realize krta hu). Learnt a lot from you. Thanks for staying with us in A100, will always remember those times.
Waise ek saal aur ruk rhe, to zaroor milenge aur bulla kaatenge.
author: Shreyash  Raj

text:
Yo Aniket!!
You were the most chilled out guy in our wing. We have lots of memories from going to mall, watching movies, treat in Kfc, playing badminton, small fights between you and triptesh ;-) . Thanks for making the mess food eatable in your tenure of mess coordi and thanks for helping out on CP questions. I really hope to meet you soon. All the best for all your future endeavours, enjoy life to the fullest.
author: Shreyash  Raj

text:
Yo Nareda!!
You were the most chilled out and cool guy of our wing. Have knowledge and opinion about everything out there. I remember the summer day when I stayed in your room, that orient cooler I still remember, felt like air conditioner. Mostly you could be found in the canteen or in GH ;-) It was great interacting with you man! Hope to meet you soon. All the best for all your future endeavours.
author: Shreyash  Raj

text:
Yo Roomie!! Kaisa hai. 
Ha to humne saath me hi campus life enjoy kra. we used to make fun of each other, you believed that I sometimes think like your mom, partying in Gulab singh, enjoying antaragini, silent disco, playing tekken, wishing to go gym/jogging from next morning everyday, Bhai tu subah utha ni pata tha yaar, sudhaar le iss harkat ko. 
Aur bhi bahut saari yaadein hai kabhi milenge to yaad krenge. Wish you the best of luck in all of your future endeavors. Hope to see you soon bro.
author: Shreyash  Raj

text:
Yo Krishan!!
Recently rajat ne jo meme share kiya tha waise hi kuch hamari first interaction hui thi. Then fir to summer winter saath hi ruke. Saari stories aapko sunaayi aur aapne bhi apne agra vale kaand ke baare me bataya. It was nice having you in this journey. Kabhi milenge to baatein yaad krenge. Hope to see you soon bro. All the best for all your future endeavours.
author: Shreyash  Raj

text:
Yo Prateek!!,
You were one of the most organised guy I met in the campus, both in your works and your thoughts. The kind of hardwork you did was always inspiring for us and we used to discuss this that we have to work like him. I remember the time when we were going to canteen at midnight you were mostly on your way to KD or RM. But at the same time you used to enjoy a lot as well, you were always there in any of the wing parties. 
so aise hi machate rho, hope to meet you soon and all the best for all your future endeavours.
author: Shreyash  Raj

text:
Yo Chauhan!! First year Roomie. Bhai room se jada to tu CC me rhta tha. 
You are truly as inspiration bro, vo rap tha na tera Namumkin jaisi koi bhi chiz ni, prove kiya bhai tune. You were very helpful as well, saale bhai hai to helpful to hoga hi. Aur kya bolun bas hope ki jald hi mile and thanks bro freshers ki meri video record krne ke liye ;-)
All the best for your future. stay in touch :-)
author: Shreyash  Raj

text:
Yo Vipin!!
First time we met when you came to A100 searching for Ali then jo uss din tumne itni lambi kahani sunaayi apni first sem drop ki mtlb kahani lambi ni thi but tum suna rhe the to lambi hogi hi ;P  then after branch change I realized how lucky I was to meet you. Bro you are very helpful, anyone with any kind of problem can approach you and you can give him (or her, mostly her I think) an hr of gyaan on any topic. Maine bahut baar pareshaan bhi kiya tumhe but you were kind enough to ignore them. Humne kayi saari outings, movies, parties saath kari, campus khulne pr milte hai aur bulla kaat te hain.
All the best.
author: Shreyash  Raj
